item.title: Pay and display parking machine, 16th June
item.description:
Pay and display parking machine in Churchfield road Parking 26020 machine has been vandalised, its almost out of the pavement falling in the road and it is wobbly. could fall on a parked car
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Churchfield Road, Welling, London

item.title: Dalston E8 footway blocked by cyclists who could see me!, 16th June
item.description:
Whilst struggling to walk on this narrow footway the Lime customers parked, right in front of me! They could see me! Please fine them heavily or ban them from using Lime in future.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Birkbeck Road, Shacklewell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal Street Parking / Abandoned Car, 16th June
item.description:
A car parks or left on a street (Foxglove Path) crossing a footway/sidewalk since Friday 13.06.25 and it seems it has not been moved. Not only parking but all motor vehicles are restricted on this street, there’s only a bike & footway.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25-29, Foxglove Path, Thamesmead, London

item.title: Abandoned car with no MOT, 16th June
item.description:
